Reviews.Title: really
Reviews.Author: janie hurst
Reviews.Content: why would anyone buy a $30 for $40 when you can go to walmart and and pay face value for the card?

Reviews.Title: Awesome Gifts for helping out friends using verizon prepaid.
Reviews.Author: T. Strong
Reviews.Content: I bought this to help out a couple of friends in need and they have verizon prepaid so this card added 30 to their phone and when i get the next i'll put it on my old phone.

Reviews.Title: i never recived my card
Reviews.Author: gordon
Reviews.Content: didn't ever receive it now its not in my order list anymore really mad about it dont know what to say...
